member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.OrderFieldDiscount.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.OrderFieldDiscount.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.OrderFieldDiscount.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.OrderFieldDiscount.OrderFieldDiscount
member.summary: Represents discount for order field The order field discount lets you apply a discount to orders with certain information in an order field. E.g. a customer has entered a voucher code in a field and gets a 25 percent discount on the entire order.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.OrderFieldDiscount.OrderFieldDiscount.ProcessOrder(Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.Orders.Order)
member.summary: Processes order by adding discount line to order lines

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.OrderFieldDiscount.OrderFieldDiscount.GetOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves SystemName and Name data of order fields
member.returns: HashTable with SystemName and Name of order field
